Posts.Title: Waiting for results. Worried2 Worried2

Posts.Content: Worried2 wrote: I went in Thurs for a double biopsy. The right side was stereotactic and the left was ultrasound. On the right side they had the replace the needle going in twice,  the second time going in I felt the pain. The right side has Micocalifications. The left side has a soild grey mass that did not collapse during sampling. A mammogram was taken of both sides after the biopsies and the mass was still present on the left side as well as the Micocalifications on the right. My breast are in pain and I'm worried after reading everyone's post about the lumps collapsing after biopsy and mine were still present Monday is memorial Day so most likely I'll need to wait till Tuesday for the results. Also I have breast discharge more so from the right side. The color of discharge varies from Green, to brown and even black. I'm 38 years old. For years I've asked for mammogram and was denied due  to my age. Thanks for reading Log in to post a reply
